Uses of Class
org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.Transaction

Packages that use Transaction
org.objectstyle.cayenne.access Contains core Cayenne container classes. 
 

Uses of Transaction in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access
 

Methods in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access that return Transaction
static Transaction Transaction.internalTransaction(TransactionDelegate delegate)
          Factory method returning a new transaction instance that would propagate commit/rollback to participating connections.
static Transaction Transaction.externalTransaction(TransactionDelegate delegate)
          Factory method returning a new transaction instance that would NOT propagate commit/rollback to participating connections.
static Transaction Transaction.noTransaction()
          Factory method returning a transaction instance that does not alter the state of participating connections in any way.
 Transaction DataDomain.createTransaction()
          Creates and returns a new inactive transaction.
 

Methods in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access with parameters of type Transaction
 boolean TransactionDelegate.willCommit(Transaction transaction)
          Called within a context of Transaction before transaction is committed.
 boolean TransactionDelegate.willMarkAsRollbackOnly(Transaction transaction)
          Called within a context of Transaction before transaction is marked as "rollback only" (meaning that further commit is impossible).
 boolean TransactionDelegate.willRollback(Transaction transaction)
          Called within a context of Transaction before transaction is rolledback.
 void TransactionDelegate.didCommit(Transaction transaction)
          Called within a context of a Transaction to notify delegate about a successful transaction commit.
 void TransactionDelegate.didRollback(Transaction transaction)
           
 boolean TransactionDelegate.willAddConnection(Transaction transaction, java.sql.Connection connection)
          Called within a context of Transaction when a new Connection is added to the list of Connections participating in transaction.
 void QueryEngine.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer, Transaction transaction)
          Executes queries in the transactional context provided by the caller.
 void DataNode.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer, Transaction transaction)
          Runs queries using Connection obtained from internal DataSource.
 void DataDomain.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer, Transaction transaction)
          Inspects the queries, sending them to appropriate DataNodes for execution.
 void DataContext.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer, Transaction transaction)
          Delegates queries execution to parent QueryEngine.
